Title: RHSA-2020:1021: GNOME security, bug fix, and enhancement update (Moderate)
Description:
GNOME is the default desktop environment of Red Hat Enterprise Linux.

Security Fix(es):

* gnome-shell: partial lock screen bypass (CVE-2019-3820)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.8 Release Notes linked from the References section.

Bugzillas.Title: error in default configurations: Cd-WARNING **: failed to get session [pid 1408]: Unknown error -2
Tracker-extract gives permission denied error in log file
[RFE] disable show text in GDM login screen/lock screen
postsession script not executed on reboot/shutdown
Name "org.gnome.Mutter.DisplayConfig" does not exist
libcanberra-login-sound.desktop: Failed to play sound: File or data not found
Not able to unlock Gnome screen with SmartCard using Coolkey
Invisible panel is made visible on click between Setting and Toggle button
gnome-shell crashes in meta_window_get_monitor, processing an unmanaged window
Window title bar shows garbled characters
On screen keyboard not visible to access with gtk apps
gnome-shell crashed with SIGSEGV in meta_monitor_mode_get_resolution()
tracker-miner-fs killed by SIGABRT when connected from remote machine with XDMCP
mouse buttons stop responding after rapid input
CVE-2019-3820 gnome-shell: partial lock screen bypass

gnome-control-center thunderbolt-cc-panel-WARNING  Could not create client Error calling StartServiceByName for org.freedesktop.bolt: GDBus.Error:org.freedesktop.systemd1.UnitMasked: Unit is masked. Memory fault(coredump)
Rebase to 3.28.2
Invalid syntax in /usr/share/applications/org.gnome.font-viewer.desktop [RHEL 7]
Java windows that have a preferred width larger than Short.MAX_VALUE are not properly displayed in RHEL7
'Error setting up rfkill: Could not open RFKILL control device, please verify your installation' output in message.
Network icon missing in gnome-shell
ctrl,alt keys and arrow keys missing on virtual keyboard
A more traditional workspace switcher for classic mode
daemon: ensure cache files for system users are processed
nautlus should not require brasero-nautilus on ppc64 and s390x
Keyboard and mouse are unresponsive after ~45 days of uptime
Update to latest upstream release
Add 7.8 to the osinfo-db which will be used on 7.8
Abnormally high CPU usage when dragging windows, cursor movement, and applications that cause frequent redraw events
Rebase to 0.19.4
gnome-shell crashes with signal 11
systemd-udevd: failed to execute '/usr/libexec/gdm-disable-wayland' '/usr/libexec/gdm-disable-wayland': No such file or directory
Fedora/RHEL/CentOS JeOS kickstart files for unattended installation are broken
Workspace switcher jumps on secondary display unexpectedly
Type to search entry doesn't show typed letters
Invalid read under idle_monitor_dispatch_timeout()
gnome-shell crashes in tcl/tk saveAs dialog when the user clicks cancel
Unresponsive Gnome Due To JavaScript Errors in RHEL 7.7
Backport performance improvements to gnome-shell in rhel-7.8
Login screen shows dots when entering username
Fix horizontal-workspaces extension in non-classic session
Extensions panel is empty
